attributes.action: Esther McVey, to step down as MP, and Minister of State for Employment.
attributes.additional_details:
An appeal to ask Esther McVey, to step down as MP, and Minister of State for Employment.
she was sending out a party-political Twitter messages during the Hillsborough memorial service.

Her vain attempt at an apology with a smile does nothing but anger many all over the country.
We Call upon Parliament to end her position as an MP, and Minister of State for Employment.
